ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DE_Contact', NOT( AND( IF(LEN (Phone) = 0,true,REGEX(Phone, "^[+]{1}[0-9]{2}[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3,12}$")), IF(LEN (HomePhone) = 0,true,REGEX(HomePhone, "^[+]{1}[0-9]{2}[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3,12}$")), IF(LEN (MobilePhone) = 0,true,REGEX(MobilePhone, "^[+]{1}[0-9]{2}[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3,12}$")), IF(LEN (OtherPhone) = 0,true,REGEX(OtherPhone, "^[+]{1}[0-9]{2}[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3,11}$")) ) ) ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Telephone numbers have to be formatted like this: +4955523681234 (+CountryCodeAreaCodeNumber).
